item.title: CV
item.description: Esteban Ignacio Ramos Education 2016-2019 BSc, Computer Science; Emory University Minor: Applied Mathematics Experience 2020-Present NCR Corporation, Atlanta Georgia, USA; Software Engineer I will begin working as a Software Engineer with NCR Corporation starting in mid February 2019 Verint Systems, Atlanta, Georgia, USA; Software Engineering Intern Developed a RESTful API in Java that facilitated querying of internal status information of a complex integration component in a largely self led project that was pushed into production after completion.
